body_html:
It looks like the ./configure script puts python_bin_path.sh into the root tensorflow/tools directory, not tensorflow/tensorflow/tools.

Either util/python/python_config.sh or tensorflow/tools/pip-package/build_pip_package.sh needs to change, and the script needs to be copied into the appropriate bazel-out directory.

body:
It looks like the ./configure script puts python_bin_path.sh into the root tensorflow/tools directory, not tensorflow/tensorflow/tools.

Either util/python/python_config.sh or tensorflow/tools/pip-package/build_pip_package.sh needs to change, and the script needs to be copied into the appropriate bazel-out directory.
